name: Adria Solutions
overview:
Founded in 2004 by David Berwick and Nicholas Derham, Adria Solutions accommodates a number of talented specialists capable of providing recruitment solutions to clients seeking both contract and permanent candidates.

Based in Poynton, Cheshire, Adria Solutions has worked with a number of enterprises from across the UK. Whether they are seeking IT and sales recruits for positions based in Manchester and the north-west, or nationally across England, their specialist staff will work passionately towards the ideal solution for your individual needs.

They pride themselves on maintaining high standards, working closely with clients and listening carefully to their specific requirements.

With customers ranging in scope from small and medium-sized UK enterprises through to multinational organisations, Adria Solutions has experience of IT recruitment within both the public and private spheres.

Specialising in information technology and sales recruitment, Adria Solutions offers expertise relating to the following technical markets

IT technologies:

§ Analyst programmers and developers VB .NET, ASP .NET, C#, SQL Server, C#

§ Web developers and designers ASP .NET, ASP, SQL Server, JavaScript, JTML, CSS, Photoshop, Illustrator, Flash, XHTML, PHP, MySQL

§ Internet marketing positions SEO management, SEO and PPC developers, online copywriters

§ PC and network support First and second line helpdesk support, network support engineers, MCSE system engineers

§ Project managers and business analysts

§ IT managers and directors
